data.name: Nox Archaist Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
A semi-ambient soundtrack to compliment the gameplay of Nox Archaist. It incorporates various game elements and story points. Both MP3 and high-quality FLAC files are included.

NOTE: The Nox Archaist game contains the MP3 soundtrack as part of the regular Steam install. The Nox Archaist Soundtrack will install the MP3 files as a standalone Steam Soundtrack that can be played within the Steam music player. In addition, the Soundtrack includes high-quality lossless FLAC files that will be automatically installed depending upon your Steam Music preferences.

All sounds created by Electric Moo, except:
  • Upright Bass on Seafaring Wayfarer: Henry Heillig
  • Extra Spellcasting: Dalkhour DíBaere, Jarrod Kailef
  • Extra Voices: The Moore Street Hawkers
  • Mysterious Traveller: Mark Lemmert

Inside Cover Art: Denis Loubet
Total Runtime: 55 minutes

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 110 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 1 GB available space
